28 int main(int argc, char **argv){
29  if(argc < 2)
30  std::cout << ("usage: process <device_port_number>") << std::endl;
31 
32  ros::init(argc, argv, "servo_motor_server");
33  ros::NodeHandle n;
34  ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("set_abs_servo_motor", setPosSrvMotor);
35 
36  // init serial connection
37  char portName[] = "/dev/ttyACM"; // port name on Linux file system
38  strcat(portName,argv[1]);
39 
40  conn = new Pololu(portName, 9600);
41  try{
42  conn->openConnection();
43  conn->getErrors();
44  }catch(ExceptionPololu *msg){
45  std::cout << "Error Pololu: " << msg->getMsg() << endl;
46  return 0;
47  }catch(...){
48  std::cout << "Unknown error, while initialising Pololu serial connection.\n";
49  return 0;
50  }
51 
52  // init servomotors
53  try{
54  fieldOMotors = new ServoMotor*[nmbMotors];
55  for(int armIdx=0; armIdx < nmbMotors; armIdx++){
56  ptrArm = new ServoMotor(armIdx, 6000, 4000 , conn);
57  ptrArm->setMinMaxDegree(-90,90);
58  fieldOMotors[armIdx] = ptrArm;
59  }
60  }catch(ExceptionPololu *msg){
61  std::cout << "Error Pololu: " << msg->getMsg() << endl;
62  shutDown();
63  return 0;
64  }catch(...){
65  std::cout << "Unknown error, while initialising Pololu controlled servo motors.\n";
66  shutDown();
67  return 0;
68  }
69 
70  ROS_INFO("Ready to process servo motor absolute positions.");
71  ros::spin();
72 
73  shutDown();
74  ROS_INFO("terminating node...\n");
75  return 0;
76 }

79 bool setPosSrvMotor(remote_robotics::servo_motor_pos::Request &input, remote_robotics::servo_motor_pos::Response &output){
80  std::string unitStr;
81 
82  output.outMotorIdxSrv = (int)input.inpMotorIdxSrv;
83  output.outPosVal = (int)input.inpPosVal;
84  unitStr = (std::string)input.inpPosUnit;
85  output.outPosUnit = unitStr;
86 
87  // check values
88  if((int)input.inpMotorIdxSrv > (nmbMotors-1)){
89  std::cout << "Motor index out of range, max. index value is " << (nmbMotors-1) << "\n";
90  return false;
91  }
92 
93  // check motor index
94  if((int)input.inpMotorIdxSrv < 0){ // neg. value then sending motor active state
95  if(conn->getMovingState()){
96  output.outPosUnit = string("ACTIVE");
97  output.outPosVal = 1;
98  }else{
99  output.outPosUnit = string("INACTIVE");
100  output.outPosVal = 0;
101  }
102  return true; // finish, no position data to be set
103  }
104 
105 
106 
107  // set position values values
108  try{
109 
110  ptrArm = fieldOMotors[(int)input.inpMotorIdxSrv];
111  if(unitStr.compare(0,3,"ABS") == 0 ){
112  ptrArm->setPositionInAbs((int)input.inpPosVal);
113  }else if (unitStr.compare(0,3,"DEG") == 0 ){
114  ptrArm->setPositionInDeg((int)input.inpPosVal);
115  }else{
116  std::cout << "Unknown unit data: " << unitStr << " but looked for 'ABS' or 'DEG'\n";
117  return false;
118  }
119  }catch(ExceptionServoMotor *msg){
120  std::cout << msg->getMsg() << std::endl;
121  return false;
122  }catch(IException *msg){
123  std::cout << msg->getMsg() << std::endl;
124  return false;
125  }catch(...){
126  std::cout << "Unknown error while set position of robot arm.\n";
127  return false;
128  }
129 
130  return true;
131 }
132 
133 
134 void shutDown(){ // free memory and close serial connection
135  for(int armIdx=0; armIdx < nmbMotors; armIdx++){
136  ptrArm = fieldOMotors[armIdx];
137  delete ptrArm;
138  }
139  conn->closeConnection();
140  delete conn;
141 
142  return;
143 }
